templates.name: You as a Child
templates.prompt: Transform this person to look like they did as a child, age 5-8 years old, innocent expression, playful, bright eyes, soft features

templates.name: 80s Retro
templates.prompt: Transform with vibrant 80s aesthetic: neon colors, retro style, vintage film grain, nostalgic vibes, bold fashion, classic 1980s look

templates.name: Cyberpunk
templates.prompt: Transform into cyberpunk style: neon lights, futuristic, dark atmospheric, tech noir, blade runner aesthetic, glowing circuits, dystopian future

templates.name: Watercolor Art
templates.prompt: Transform into beautiful watercolor painting: soft edges, flowing colors, artistic, hand-painted texture, paper grain, delicate washes

templates.name: Anime Style
templates.prompt: Transform into anime art style: cel-shaded, vibrant colors, expressive large eyes, manga aesthetic, clean linework, Japanese animation

templates.name: Superhero
templates.prompt: Transform into superhero: powerful heroic pose, dramatic lighting, epic atmosphere, comic book style, cape flowing, heroic proportions

templates.name: Vintage Film
templates.prompt: Transform into vintage photograph: sepia tones, film grain, faded colors, nostalgic 1950s aesthetic, classic photography, timeless

templates.name: Oil Painting
templates.prompt: Transform into classical oil painting: rich textures, painterly visible brushstrokes, renaissance style, museum quality, classical art masterpiece

templates.name: Film Noir
templates.prompt: Transform into film noir style: high contrast black and white, dramatic hard shadows, 1940s detective movie aesthetic, mystery, moody

templates.name: Fantasy Portrait
templates.prompt: Transform into fantasy portrait: magical atmosphere, ethereal lighting, mythical, elvish features, enchanted, mystical aura, fantasy realm

templates.name: Pixel Art
templates.prompt: Transform into pixel art: 8-bit style, retro gaming aesthetic, limited color palette, crisp square pixels, nostalgic video game look

templates.name: Pencil Sketch
templates.prompt: Transform into detailed pencil sketch: crosshatching, graphite texture, artistic hand-drawn, charcoal shading, realistic sketch

templates.name: Pop Art
templates.prompt: Transform into pop art: bold vibrant colors, high contrast, halftone dots, Andy Warhol style, screen print aesthetic, iconic pop culture

templates.name: Zombie
templates.prompt: Transform into zombie: realistic decaying skin, horror makeup, undead features, spooky dark atmosphere, walking dead aesthetic

templates.name: Medieval Portrait
templates.prompt: Transform into medieval portrait: renaissance painting style, historical period clothing, classical composition, oil painting technique, regal

templates.name: Neon Glow
templates.prompt: Add vibrant neon glow effects: bright neon colors, electric atmosphere, glowing edges, illuminated, nighttime vibrancy

templates.name: Cartoon
templates.prompt: Transform into cartoon character: simplified features, bold black outlines, bright flat colors, animated style, fun and playful

templates.name: Gothic
templates.prompt: Transform into gothic style: dark moody atmosphere, dramatic, Victorian gothic fashion, mysterious, elegant darkness

templates.name: Cosmic
templates.prompt: Transform with cosmic space theme: swirling galaxies, colorful nebulas, stars, cosmic colors, space atmosphere, celestial

templates.name: Steampunk
templates.prompt: Transform into steampunk style: Victorian era fashion, brass gears, mechanical elements, industrial aesthetic, vintage technology
